title.rendered: Pune Fashion Week supports girl child education for the second consecutive year

content.rendered:
Pune Fashion week for the second consecutive year supported Smile Foundation’s initiative for girl child education, She Can Fly during the fashion week which was held from the 22nd-24th December 2017. Girls from Mission Education centre of Smile Foundation walked alongside celebrity influencers including showstopper and Smile Foundation Goodwill Ambassador Divya Khosla Kumar to raise awareness on the importance of girl child education. Celebrity fashion designer Rina Dhaka was entitled as one of Smile Foundation’s Goodwill Ambassador – skill development (Fashion Designing), for supporting the cause.

Smile Foundation’s She Can Fly initiative is an effort to enable, equip and empower girl children with quality education, proper nutrition, good health, adequate skills, and above all a lot of self-confidence to help them live their lives to their fullest potential.
